item.title: Mentioned by Macleans.ca
item.description:
The Clarity Act debate
Six hours or so after Claude Patry's move from the NDP to the Bloc, the House moved to the second hour of debate on the Bloc's bill to repeal the Clarity Act last night. No less than five New Democrats—Mathieu Ravignat, Robert Aubin, Nycole Turmel, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Toronto Star
item.description:
NDP Leader Mulcair raps Tories for stance on resource sharing
... Michael;, and Mike Redmond, the NDP leader for Prince Edward Island. NDP MP Robert Aubin, the chair of the Quebec caucus, will also be there, as will NDP MP Dennis Bevington (Western Arctic), because Yukon NDP Leader Liz Hanson could not attend.

item.title: Mentioned by Vancouver Sun
item.description:
Federal-provincial NDP leaders' summit to focus on economic successes
The federal party's Quebec caucus chairman Robert Aubin will also attend as the province's representative since there is no Quebec NDP wing despite the fact the province elected a record number of New Democrat MPs in the last federal election. Mulcair's ...
